channel.title: A MM convert Buff
channel.description:
Greetings liars !
Ok so yerterday a played a game as the Mastermind, definitely my most hated class but anyway...
The thing who happend yersterday was that : N1 convert x - immune/barrier N2 convert x - immune/barrier N3 convert x - immune/barrier D3 My assassin being Exécuted N4 convert x - prevented (Dead)
( x was always a different person of the last night try) ( i dont remembre if i use the other abilty N2 or N3, cant remember if there was the cooldown of the convert)
You can feel the pain... Unfunny, and very short game for everyone so i’ve thinking of a new night ability who can be used after 3-4 fail convert, something like « Convert a Random guy who can be converted tonight »
It’s assure you to success the convert on a random guy who can be convertable. 1 use.
Idk if its a good idea i just wanna share my opinion and have some feed-back on this... And obvioulsy D4 king get me up and i don’t even try to defense my self, just tell to the court to kill me because the game was so fucked up for the unseen (court thought it was a fool play lol, but stil exe me thanks god)

item.title: A MM convert Buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Actually I just realized. Unseen win rates are really good and unlike the cult it isn’t as big of an issue to not have 3 members.

So instead I propose that the seeker be given the following day ability:

Day ability: Foresee - At the start of the night see if the target can be converted (2 uses)

This would take a lot of guess work out of conversions early on before meany claims have been made.
